The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 November is 1,152,981 (2,048.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 November, there were 147,013 new confirmed cases (261.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 November, there were 135,929 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% ( 11,084 extra cases).
